title: Salted Caramel Hot Chocolate with Homemade Whipped Topping
directions: In a large sauce pan, combine cocoa powder, sugar, and water. Stir over medium heat until the sugar dissolves.
Add milk, half and half, and vanilla extract. Cook until it is heated through but not simmered or boiled. Stir in salted Caramel until it dissolves.
Pour the hot chocolate into mugs. Top with whipped topping, drizzle additional caramel and sprinkle of chocolate. Yields: 5 cups
While the hot chocolate is cooking, place a large metal mixing bowl into the freezer for 10 minutes.

Remove the bowl from the freezer and place sugar into the mixing bowl. Add whipping cream and vanilla. Beat on high speed with an electric mixer just until the cream reaches stiff peaks. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ⅓ cup unsweetened good quality cocoa powder
⅓ cup water (I used filtered water)
⅓ cup Smucker's Simple Delight Salted Caramel Topping, plus extra for drizzling
